article_title: 5-year-old girl hurt in drive-by shooting in northeast Kansas
article_text:
Credit: KCTV

A 5-year-old girl has been wounded in a drive-by shooting in Kansas City, Kansas.

KSHB-TV reports that the shooting happened around 3:30 Saturday morning. Police say the girl was sleeping in a home when she was struck. She was taken to a hospital with injuries to her leg and hip that were described as non-life threatening.

No arrests were immediately made.
